column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Jonathan - Thank you very much for your great review. I'm glad you decided to give us a try and have since become one of our esteemed "JINYA Regulars." We appreciate your understanding of our limited seating. If we could go back to 2013
column2: we would have tried to build a shop that was three times our existing space. Nevertheless
column4: and we hope you'll come back again soon!
